author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA IS EXPECTED TO MAKE LANDFALL SOON ALONG THE SOUTHERN COAST OF EASTERN CUBA AS AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS MAJOR HURRICANE...
summary: ...MELISSA IS EXPECTED TO MAKE LANDFALL SOON ALONG THE SOUTHERN COAST OF EASTERN CUBA AS AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS MAJOR HURRICANE... As of 2:00 AM EDT Wed Oct 29 the center of Melissa was located near 19.7, -76.4 with movement NE at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 952 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA IS EXPECTED TO MAKE LANDFALL SOON ALONG THE SOUTHERN COAST OF EASTERN CUBA AS AN EXTREMELY DANGEROUS MAJOR HURRICANE... title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
